title: How to cook venison
description: This is venison cooked to melt in your mouth and served with a punchy pickle dressing on a light, refreshing salad.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz bag watercress, or a mix of peppery leaves
1 pickled walnut, thinly sliced, plus 2 tsp juice from the jar
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper
